alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Clark; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 13 at 7:48PM CDT until April 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Friday... .Unseasonably warm, dry and breezy conditions will continue to lead to potential critical fire weather conditions on Friday across west-central into central Wisconsin. Very dry fine fuels will promote quick ignitions and rapid spread of any fire that gets started, making it difficult to control. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR WEST-CENTRAL INTO CENTRAL WISCONSIN ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WEST-CENTRAL INTO CENTRAL WISCONSIN... * AFFECTED AREA...In Wisconsin, Clark, Buffalo, Trempealeau, Jackson, La Crosse, Monroe, Juneau and Adams. * TIMING...through 8 pm today for Red Flag Warning. 11 am to 8 pm Friday for Fire Weather Watch. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph Friday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent Friday. * TEMPERATURES...Highs Friday in the low 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start will quickly become difficult to control and spread rapidly. Please heed any local burning bans.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Clark; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau
